BBEX3.A.SGD.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Singapore / EUR 1 = SGD ... (middle)
General: Under an agreement between Singapore and Brunei Darussalam, the Brunei dollar (convertible at par) is also accepted as legal tender.

Source: Since 2007 Monetary Authority of Singapore Previously calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the following banks: December 2001 - December 2006 Deutsche Bank, Singapore Branch 1999 - November 2001 BHF-Bank, Singapore Branch
Methodology: Until December 2006, calculated on the basis of buying and selling rates, from 2007 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates, from 2012 calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
